name: Visible Thoughts: 016
description:
016 of the Visible Thoughts series.

The future seems so far away until you realize each passing second is part of that future. Moons, planets, and stars seem so much grander than us until we remember they're made of the same particles as us. At the end of the day, we're all atoms. We're all part of something, all have an important role to play, all have something great to contribute that keeps the world turning no matter how small we feel sometimes. Each step we take is significant and each word we say has impact whether we see it or not. I have to remind myself of this often. I am important and so are you, even if it doesn't feel that way sometimes.
